# Gene Warren Jr.

|birth_place   = Los Angeles, California, U.S.
|death_date    =
|death_place   = Hollywood Hills, California, U.S.
|occupation    = Visual effects artist
|parents       = Gene Warren (father)

Gene Francis Warren Jr. (July 22, 1941 â€“ November 28, 2019) was an American visual effects artist. He was best known for his work in the first two Terminator film series, and he won an Academy Award in the category Best Visual Effects for the film Terminator 2: Judgment Day. Warren died in November 2019 at his home in Hollywood Hills, California, at the age of 78.
Selected filmography
* Terminator 2: Judgment Day (1991; co-won with Dennis Muren, Stan Winston and Robert Skotak)
